::KitKat/DarkMouse::


KitKat:::
She heard the voice of Megatron on her link.
"Commander Megatron, I am returning to the base with Terrorsaur and a 
new member of our pack, Rowdy. He is a friend of Quickstrike.  We 
shall return shortly commander."
She looked at Rowdy, "He doesn't sound happy, let's get the lead out."
She ran at her top speed for the base.  She got zapped by Megatron 
once, and didn't want to happen again.

DarkMouse::

She stood up as Megatron entered the base.  She offered him an 
energon cube. "Sir, Quickstrike and Stringtra went out and shall be 
back soon.  I over heard a transmission from Quickstrike that he 
found something that might interest you greatly.  KitKat and 
Terrorsaur will return shortly.  Dracona came here, but we have 
authorization for access, so I denied it."

She wasn't afraid of Megatron, she was more afraid of his temper.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> ::: Hell Beast, with Mosquitor slung over his shoulder who so 
conveniently 
> went into stasis during the battle, made his way to the ship. 
Transanulas, 
> Jackle, and Gremlin follow him. The see there pursuers, but dont 
really give 
> a fuck anymore. :::
> 
> ::: Hell Beast, slumping Mosquitor down in a corridor, goes into 
his private 
> CR tank, while the others go in crew tanks. :::
> 
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> ::: Black Aracnia smiled as she waded deeper into the muck of the 
swamp. She 
> could easily see that there was a stasis pod sticking clear up 
through it. :::
> 
> ::: Black Aracnia ::: Thanks to you....fembots will rule Cybertron!
> 
> ::: She floats the pod to the sore and drags it behinde her. 
Thankfully, this 
> neck of the swamp was just a mile away from the Predacon base, 
which was in 
> full view. :::
> 
> ::: Black Aracnia, activating the ramp to one of the cargo holds, 
drags the 
> stasis pod into the dark room, and closes the ramp. :::
> 
> ::: Demona, her hand resting on her baster approaches. ::: About 
time.
> 
> ::: Black Aracnia ::: Shut up! It was hard enough to get this thing 
here. 
> Now, get ready to transfer the phetus data.
> 
> ::: Demona inserts a wire from her temple into the main computer to 
the pod. 
> Black Aracnia pours over the data and then the transfer begins. A 
blue bar 
> appears on the monitor, and it slowly fills with the transfer. :::
> 
> ::: Demona ::: This hurts.
> 
> ::: Black Aracnia ::: Your memory banks are being stressed, its 
supposed to 
> hurt.
> 
> ::: After a slow hour, the bar fills, the wire is detached, and 
they both 
> stand to see what comes out. :::
> 
> ::: Black Aracnia ::: Scince your a T-rex, and hell Beast is a 
reptile...I 
> wonder what its form will be...
> 
> ::: Demona ::: Is it to late to program it to be a Raptor?
> 
> ::: Black Aracnia ::: No....is that what you want?
> 
> :: Demona ::: Yes. Yes it is.
> 
> ::: Black Aracnia makes the changes and the lid pops open. Stryfe 
climbs out. 
> His jade eyes search the room and lock on Demona. :::
> 
> ::: Stryfe ::: Excellent. The data transfer was a success.
> 
> ::: Demona ::: Now all you have to do is kill Hell Beast and take 
the title!
> 
> ::: Strye was tall, strong, warrior like. His visable wepons 
included a sub 
> machine, optic lasers, and seeker missles. :::
> 
> ::: Stryfe ::: Lets go meet dad.
> 
> ~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> ::: Marine lay streached on the table of Ominous Prime. Rescued 
from the tar 
> pits, he was vastly damaged and almost unrepairable. Now, he 
implated the 
> final data chip in his banks. :::
> 
> ::: Marine's eyes lit up just as a flash of lighting broke the cold 
winters 
> night. :::
> 
> ::: Marine ::: The fembot, she shot me!
> 
> ::: Ominous ::: Fembot? Dosent matter now. Your repaired.
> 
> ::: Marine ::: Your an enemy to the Commander!
> 
> ::: Ominous ::: Oh yes. This war has brought out the worst in us. I 
saw you 
> in distress and chose to help you. Is there anything wrong with 
that?
> 
> ::: Marine shook it off, got up, and looked around the freakish 
lair of the 
> scientist. What caught his eye was the vat of liquid energon that 
the bot 
> thrived on. :::
> 
> ::: Ominous ::: Now, your to weak to leave here now. Its the dead 
of winter 
> and this is the Artic. Its 85' below zero outside. Your mech would 
freeze. 
> 
> ::: Marine ::: Then...your helping me?
> 
> ::: Ominous ::: Yes. Im sick of this pathetic war. When your 
recovered I will 
> take you to Hell Beast and we will leave the planet.
> 
> ::: Marine ::: Leave?
> 
> ::: Ominous ::: He has enough enegon, and his mission is complete. 
We would 
> benefit from it. 
> 
> ::: Marine nodded. He longed for Cybertron, and the wa was getting 
out of 
> hand. Departure seemed the only way. :::
> 
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> ::: Megatron returned and climbed into a CR Tank. When he emerged 
he turned 
> to Kitkat for a full report. :::
> 
> ::: Megatron ::: Kitkat, Report!
> 
> ~~~~~~~~~~~
> 
> That whole ark being saved is the biggest Bullshit I have ever seen 
in this 
> RPG.
